mapper.select: SELECT t.`id`,t.`statusId`,t.`tName`,d.valueName FROM task t JOIN dictionary d ON t.`statusId`=d.`valueId` WHERE typeCode='SHZT'

SELECT t.`id`,t.`tName`,d.valueName,(SELECT u.`realName` FROM users u WHERE u.`id`=t.`auditId`) Name,u.`realName`,t.`createdtime` FROM task t JOIN dictionary d ON t.`statusId`=d.`valueId` JOIN users u ON t.`createdby`=u.`id` WHERE typeCode='SHZT' and t.id=#{id}
